word_mean: 凝聚：两种液体(其中一种液体或两种液体均为胶体)的混合物分离为两种液相时(例如将阿拉伯树胶加至明胶中)，其中一种液相(凝聚层)含胶体微粒，另一液相为水溶液

sentence.Network_en: The present paper reported gelatin - peach gum complex coacervation method of microencapsulated phoxim.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用明胶 - 桃胶为囊材的复合凝聚方法使辛硫磷微胶囊化.

sentence.Network_en: METHODS Chitosan - CpG ODN nanoparticles were prepared by complex coacervation method.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法:采用复凝聚方法制备CpGODN壳聚糖纳米粒.

sentence.Network_en: Methods: Lycopene microcapsules were prepared by simple coacervation technique orthogonal design.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法: 用单凝聚法制备微囊,并用正交实验优化制备工艺.
